note.p: Soldier. Brother of Donald Douglas. Lieutenant, Ninety-Seventh regiment, 1841. Resident at High Street, Hythe, Kent.
Canada, British regimental registers of service, 1756–1900 (Ancestry.com, accessed 4 July 2019)
Post Office directory of the six home counties 1855
see also Correspondence vol. 13, Supplement, letter from [John Innes], [after 8 February – August 1855]
